page.title: 12Unemployment in Darlington
page.content: {April 1985} Unemployment is very bad this year. My dad is unemployed and if he didn't have the allotment he would go mad. My mam is working at a clothes shop under the town clock. The owner is being forced to sell half the shop because of the high cost of rates. This could lead to some people being made redundant. To decrease unemploy- ment I think the rates should be cut. {June1985}My dad has a job as a boiler- attendant at the chemical works in Faverdale. When the family heard I felt very happy. There was an interview between him and another man. Now he is on the night- shift for a week, starting at 11 pm and finishing at 7 am. We found out on June 15th that he had got the job. My mam said it was like Christmas.{ { } {Louise Whitton
